website_summaries.verdict: For snapshooters looking to enter the world of connected cameras, the 21x zoom Samsung WB850F is a good place to start.
pros: The Samsung WB850F is a feature-packed compact megazoom with a versatile lens, very good picture quality, and excellent Wi-Fi capabilities
cons: The WB850F's shooting performance is a bit mixed, its battery life is mediocre, and its interface, while very good, can take some time to learn

website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung WB850F is a compact superzoom camera with a wider-than-average lens, GPS, and Wi-Fi, but its a little slow to start and shoot, and image quality suffers at higher ISO settings.
cons: Loss of detail at higher ISOs

customer_reviews.title: The panorama mode is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, still learning what it can do, and I own a pro model D-700 Nikon. I had to buy a second one because I was high on a ladder taking a picture in an aircraft wing and the loop tether got caught on a sharp edge and it was ripped out of my hand and it dropped 6' onto concrete, and hit on the corner. It became an instant paperweight, I had to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: J. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: I have had this camera for years and it performs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for years and it performs perfectly. It's compact, well made and the color it produces and lens are fabulous. This camera together with my photo program I use exclusively for my art site and have had photographers in their business for 30 years say that they can't do what I do. I know most of its features but it does so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Well made camera
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent camera. Dated by now, but still use it for stills and video. wifi works for uploading to cloud. I wish it had a more up to date means of printing to my Samsung wireless printer. Picture quality is excellent. small enough to carry on your belt, or if you don't mind a bit of bulk, in a pocket. Still charges up and holds the charge well. Good purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Project Mangler

customer_reviews.title: Good things come in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to document the products we sell. These photos are used for design, technical and assembly assistance, so I needed a camera capable of hi res., quality photos for sharpness of detail, especially when zooming in on photos for reference. This camera does this perfectly, with so many other features that it turned out to be much more than I was hoping for. The firmware upgrade solved any issues that I had with it.
customer_reviews.author: sspudich

customer_reviews.title: Firmware was not updated
customer_reviews.text: Frimware was suppose to be updated as of June but I got mine in Oct and it was not. Battery life goes dead in one day if left in camera with out update and it will not connect wifi to anything without it. Took 4 hours on phone with 3 tech to update it. Images are blurry if subject is moving at all.
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: A lot of functions but image quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: + easy to use + good video quality + great zoom + wi-if makes it very convenient to backup and share photos - picture quality could be better (especially indoors) - auto mode doesn't always choose the best mode for the light - battery life not great
customer_reviews.author: Rui Pereira

customer_reviews.title: WiFi is just fair
customer_reviews.text: Camera is easy to operate, takes great photos, lots of fun stuff. The WiFi is not reliable, I have not been able to upload more than 1 photo at a time. Just okay!
customer_reviews.author: mseverson

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best point and shoot I've ever used! It is not the best camera during night and low light but hey, it works!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisAstro

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get one...very much worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Alaska...it works fantastic! I video taped my whole helicopter trip up to a glacier and what a Great video, so easy to use and unbelievable pictures. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. Looked into Galaxy camera but too expensive and had to get a data plan. This seems to take very nice pictures. Downloads pics slowly even when on excellent WiFi signal. Would have loved to buy one with Android software but the cameras I looked at(Nikon has one) seemed to have too many question marks. So we'll go with this one until the Galaxy camera is fine tuned and cheaper in couple years
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Selmi

customer_reviews.title: Smart camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and has lots of features but the GPS does not work all the time even outdoors in wide open spaces, The video doesn't work at all. l hope a firmware update can fix it. I'm going back to Canon when they get a similar camera
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Camera WB850F
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera new for 2 months and use it for my short trip. It performs perfectly fine from what I expected. The SmartCamera options are cool. Indoor and outdoor picture lightnings are good. It is easy to use. I recommended this Samsung Camera WB850F to every body.
customer_reviews.author: Bambie

customer_reviews.title: Great smart camera
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very smart, fast, functional at a good price, all digital manual Cons: all digital manual, which is harder for older camera enthusiasts to read
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Defective out of the box. Could not connect to interal memory to upgrade firmware to stop battery discharing. Did not like flash location.
customer_reviews.author: Jimdorn1

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Telescopic lens extension.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it in to have the mechanism repaired. It would not open or close properly. I paid the postage. It works now.
customer_reviews.author: David Klinkhamer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Bells and Whistles
customer_reviews.text: This camera has lots of "intelligent" features (bells and whistles) that will take me a long time to understand and master, but I like its size, the super zoom (for bird pictures, for my own pleasure, not high enough quality to use professionally), the high pixel count, and the wi-fi potential for sending our family pictures from our drive to Alaska next summer. I'm looking forward to getting better acquainted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Blythe C. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, cannot be turned on anymore... stay tuned, contacted Samsung for replacement
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this camera - great specs, all features I really wanted to see. The 3 months the camera worked, it worked well! Good quality pics, GPS relatively fast, WIFI very flexible. But then the camera simply stalled. After I changed the battery (no, battery life is not that great), I could not turn in on anymore. No drop, no water damage - the camera simply stalled. Now, I contacted Samsung and the camera is still covered by warranty. Repair ticket was generated... we'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Axel Grothey

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!! Gave it to my wife as a present and loves it. Shutter speed a little slow but other than that it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin antonetty

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied from the purchase of this camera as it meets my expactations. I would recommend it to anyone who wants compactable small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Petrov

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. Would not charge to battery or download from CD. Did order a replacement. Hoping this one is better.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Loveit
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It has so many features that I still haven't used. The more I use it, the more I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen A. De La Parra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: I love to take pictures as a hobby so I wanted to find an easy to use but take great pictures camera. This camera does exactly what I wanted. After I update with the firmware, my battery lasted so much longer than before. I use the smart mode the whole time and use the zoom a lot. It takes great pictures really quick so I snap and snap and snap like those paparazzi snapping pictures at whomever they were chasing. I've loaded some shots while on the road so you guys can see. Haven't used the Wifi, GPS or panorama mode yet so I can't comment. But this is an excellent camera for amateurs and beginners like me.
customer_reviews.author: linrick

customer_reviews.title: Battery only lasts 1-2 days
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera since it was first released in mid-2012. I find its battery is *always* dead when I pull out the camera to use it. Not low, but *dead*. That makes the camera unusable. I am not always able to charge the camera each and every night, so the camera is effectively useless. There are dozens of posts on dpreview from other owners who echo this problem; the battery only lasts 1-2 days, even after its firmware is updated. There is no need for me to go into details about the camera features, controls, picture quality or any other. It is unusable so none of these matter and I cannot recommend anyone purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Tappe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but not ready when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: When I received my camera I just couldn't be happier. Great options to play around, not too difficult to master and having a pocket camera with a 21x zoom I just couldn't ask for anything more... but...but... Every time you pick up the camera for a quick pic, the battery is dead. Oh... I left the gps on, was my first thought, but no! The camera eats the battery in less than 2 days when left in your carry on bag. Its like having two smartphones, you just cannot forget to recharge it every night while traveling, and if you leave it unattended at home and a UFO parks in your backyard, sorry, the battery will be dead.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck58

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera, just not all I had hoped it was. I immediately contacted Amazon and the seller to find out what their return policy was. Neither ever returned my emails so I was forced to keep the camera. I used it through the holidays and have learned to like it more. Still would have liked to at least exchange it for a higher quality one. I may not be buying from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Sv

product_meta.title: Samsung WB850F 16 MP Smart Long Zoom Digital Camera - Black EC (WB850FBPBUS)
product_meta.description: The WB850F Samsung SMART Camera allows you to zoom in close, capture stunning photos using a 16 MP BSI CMOS Sensor, and share them instantly with family and friends. Using the camera's built-in wireless functionality, you can upload high quality photos to social networking sites and seamlessly sync your camera to other SMART devices (TV, phone, tablet).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars52 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
